name: swamm
description:
swamm is a first-person horror game.

Controls

Controls are displayed in the table below and can also be viewed in-game by selecting the "Controls" option in the main menu.

Move W, A, S, DSprint Hold left shift Crouch Hold left control Interact with object EUse itemLeft mouse button AimRight mouse button Switch item Mouse scroll wheelPause game Escape

There are 2 endings.

Directions

1. Download.

2. Unzip.

3. Run "swamm.exe" executable.

NOTE: You may notice that the name of the Windows application is called "GlitterGold". This was the temporary name we had during development, but the official name of the game is "swamm". 

Enjoy
